import axios from "axios" import useSwr from "swr" import { reactLocalStorage } from 'reactjs-localstorage'; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Footer() { const [selectedCurrency, setSelectedCurrency] = useState(reactLocalStorage.getObject("currency")); const fetcher = async (url) => await axios.get(url).then(res => res.data) const { data } = useSwr(`${process.env.API_URL}static/config`, fetcher, { revalidateOnFocus: false }) const setCurrency = (e) => { let currency = data.filter(d => parseInt(e.target.value) === d.id) reactLocalStorage.setObject('currency', currency[0]); } return (
